dataList.appIntro:
To our Android family!! This is our PUBLIC BETA VERSION, meaning - it is a very early version and you may experience bugs/errors. If there are bugs, please email us (team@unum.la) and we'll fix them ASAP. Please know that we are working very hard to bring all the great features we've built to Android! 
STORY WITH NEW UPDATE:
To our unbelievably patient and supportive Android Family <3 Thank you! You seriously don’t know how much it means to us. The positive emails, the helpful tips, and the words of encouragement throughout this process was so appreciated! It was very difficult finding these bugs and bringing in all the new features we built, and we couldn’t have done it without your help. So thank you to each and every one of you from the bottom of our hearts! 
TBH, this is how we feel right now: Imagine you’re sitting on a white sandy beach, right before the sun sets. The soft sand is wedged between your toes. Leaning back - you look off into the horizon and see a faint silhouette. You notice it is drawing closer to you, and then you notice something in its hand. Before the silhouette becomes recognizable, you hear a beautiful melody. It’s Kendrick Lamar’s new HUMBLE song pumping...Haha jk, it’s Journey’s Don’t Stop Believing. 
You can now make out the figure - it’s the UNUM team, slowly running to you with a bouquet of hand picked dandelions in one hand and a box of chocolates (Non GMO and Vegan of course) in the other. They give you a huge hug, look into your eyes, and say thank you for standing by us. You look up slightly, holding back some tears, and smile. We sit and watch the sunset, together. 
END STORY.
**Public Beta Version**
You want sleek.
You want powerful.
You want beautiful.
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
Your design tool for Instagram. End Ugly Instas.
–––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––
READ FIRST: Only download if you are unconventional. 
We are so so excited to launch on Android! Again, please know that is is the PUBLIC BETA VERSION! We're going to be updating a lot in the coming weeks, so stay tuned, but we wanted you all to be able to start designing your insta today!
• Store all your Insta worthy photos in one place, for any account! *no more aimlessly scrolling through your camera roll
• Visually plan your grid •• Rearrange Tool 
• Tell limitless stories •• Multiple Accounts 
• Dive into your data •• Analytics 
• Add depth to your photos •• Edit/Filter Tool 
• Save time and increase efficiency •• Custom Scheduling + Reminders 
• Freedom to share to Instagram anytime •• Direct Post 
• Create complexity •• Tile Tool 
• Personalize your message beforehand •• Caption Pen 
• Customize your style in settings •• Light Mode/Dark Mode + Schemes 
• Hide your posted Instagram photos to see what your feed would look like without them •• Phantom Mode 
• Make your grid interactive •• Live Grid 
• Store your photos from your Camera Roll to UNUM
• And more for you to uncover ;)
If you’re reading this, you’re already late to the game. Thousands of Instagrammers, from influencers to brands to high-growth startups, are controlling their story with UNUM. 
Here’s our story:
| E Pluribus UNUM…A Latin phrase that means, “Out of many, one.”
| Out of many pictures is one story, yours. 
| We needed UNUM to tell our story, now let UNUM tell yours. 
| We’re a community of passionate photographers, designers, adventurers, and storytellers. 
| We welcome you into our family. We welcome you into our hearts. 
| Don’t be a stranger, reach us (team@unum.la) anytime.
Join our fam | @unumdesign | 
Special thanks to our friends: @discoverearth @kaleyymorgan @livblankson @b.r.e.t.t.y @umeusstudios @bella.ashylnn @nataliebanilbo @joannahalpin @coppergarden 
We’d love to feature your instagram, email us your insta handle and a lil bio so we can take a look! 
Happy designing! 
Luv, 
UNUM
Privacy Policy: http://unum.la/privacy-policy/
Terms of Use: http://unum.la/terms-of-service/
